column4: can any one help me with sound problem..not able to play any sound..but login sound played properly
try System Preferences Sound and test the sounds.  As well, you can select a different audio driver and see if that makes any difference
under Device, it has a list.  When you hit test, are you getting a high pitch?
click the sounds tab, if the login sound was heard, try testing for it again and others there as well
